channel.title: DoomEmacs on Nerd things and more...

item.title: Doom, Emacs & Windows
item.description:
Doom-emacs. It's a configuration framework for Emacs. Basically, it overrides the Emacs keybindings with most of vim's.

As I mentioned in the last post. I started using Emacs at work due to org-modeâ€¦ and work PC's use windows behind a Firewall, so using git, pip, melpa and some more are useless in my work desktop (In the Laptop all of them work if I connect to another network, which was what I did).
